Merge pull request #132 from skurfuerst/master

Revert "[BUGFIX] Display Hallo toolbar correctly when page has a global margin set"

Revert "[BUGFIX] Display Hallo toolbar correctly when page has a global margin set"

the real root-cause of the problem was introduced by having a "position:relative"
style on the "body"-Tag (due to the use of the Zurb Foundation framework).
Removing this style, the positioning problem is solved.

This reverts commit 34e4a6fef0213b9b0164200179358268ab1de23c.

Merge pull request #131 from skurfuerst/master

Display Hallo toolbar correctly when page has a global margin set

[BUGFIX] Display Hallo toolbar correctly when page has a global margin set

If the body has a margin-top or margin-left set, the hallo controls appear
too far at the bottom or too far at the right without this change.

With this change, the location is correct.
